name: A Te
author: Gianni Diurno

sections.description: “A Te” is a slight modification of the “Hello, Dolly” plugin that comes with WordPress. When activated, it displays the lyrics to the Lorenzo Cherubini song “A Te” in the top right corner of the admin panel.
sections.installation:
1. Upload a te.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Fall in love every time you write a new post
sections.faq:
Q. does it work with “Hello, Dolly”?

A. they both work, but the lyrics overlap each other. If you really want them both at once, edit your “a te.php” file and change the line “top: 2.3em;” to “top: 3.3em”.

short_description: Displays the lyrics to the Lorenzo Cherubini (aka Jovanotti) song "A Te" in the top right corner of the admin panel.
description: “A Te” is a slight modification of the “Hello, Dolly” plugin that comes with WordPress. When activated, it displays the lyrics to the Lorenzo Cherubini song “A Te” in the top right corner of the admin panel.
